oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vanadium Air Pollution: A Possible Cause of"Ill-Thrift" in Dairy Cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gummow, B.
Bastianello, Stella S.
Botha, C. J.
Basson, A. T.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ill-thrift
epidemiological study
air pollution
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In April 1990 the Veterinary Research Institute (VRI) at Onderstepoort was approached by a private veterinarian to do an epidemiological study into the cause of "ill-thrift" occurring in a dairy herd in the eastern Transvaal, South Africa.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1992: Volume 3; 299-305
